body.name: REDTIGER F7N Dash Cam Hardwire Kit, 21.3ft USB C Port Hard Wire Kit for Dashcam,Converts 12V-24V to 5V/2.5A Low Voltage Protection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 13 mins
features: [ Type-C hardwire kit ] 21.3ft Type-C USB hardwire kit for dash cam or other device powered by USB-C , 5V/2A steady output, voltage input supports from 12V-24V.
[ EASY TO INSTALL ] For this mini usb fuse kit, there's no need to use a cable from car cigarette lighter socket, instead it's a permanent hidden cable, and very easy to install.

[ 24 HOURS MONITOR ] 24 Hours Surveillance: The vehicle hard-wire kit connect to car battery or fuse box power, can realize continuous power supply for 24 hours. It can keep powered on even car turned off.

[ LOW VOLTAGE PROTECTING ] Multiple Security Protection - With low voltage protection, REDTIGER hardwire kit will automatically cut off the power after 60s when the voltage is lower than 11.8V（+-0.2). Not applicable to trucks with voltage above 24V. More security protection like over-current, short-circuit, reverse connection, and overheat.
[ WORRY FREE SERVICES ] 1 year free-replacement warranty for quality problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The REDTIGER F7N Dash Cam Hardwire Kit compatible with USB-C F7N Series Dash Cams. -Warm tips: 1. Please make sure the ACC and BAT is connected correctly. 2. Please feel free to reach us if any professional help in need. 3. Please use the dedicated hardwire kit for the REDTIGER F7N/F7NP/F7NS/F7NT dash cam, Because the other brands of hardwire kits are not available for Redtiger dash cams. 4. The length of this hardwire kit is 11.5ft, suitable for most trucks, SUVs and other vehicles. 5. Please note that installation steps may vary by vehicle model and specific conditions. It is strongly recommended to refer to the vehicle manual or seek professional help before installation. -Instructions for installation 1. Make sure everything is ready and safe before installation. 2. Locate the car's fuse box. It is usually located under the dashboard on the driver's side or in the engine compartment. 3. Identify the ACC (Accessory) fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power when the ignition is on. Locate the constant power fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power even when the ignition is off. 4. Connect the red wire from the hardwire kit to the ACC fuse slot. Connect the yellow wire from the hardwire kit to the constant power fuse slot. You can use a fuse tap or a fuse adapter to make the connection. 5. Find a suitable grounding point near the fuse box. It should be a metal surface that is securely connected to the vehicle's chassis. 6. Connect the black wire from the hardwire kit to the grounding point using a ring terminal or a suitable grounding connector. 7. Once all the connections are secure, tuck away any excess wires and ensure they are safely routed to avoid interference with the vehicle's controls. 8. Test the hardwire kit by turning on the ignition. The dash cam should receive power and start functioning.

Low Voltage Protection Ensure the safety of your vehicle's battery with the Redtiger Hardwire Kit. It features a low voltage protection mode that cuts off power when the voltage drops below 11.8V(+-0.2). Universal Compatibility Designed to fit various vehicle models, the 11.5ft long Redtiger Hardwire Kit is compatible with 12-24V vehicles, providing a versatile solution for your dash cam installation needs. 24H Parking Monitoring and G-Sensor The Redtiger hardwire kit connected to car fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 12/24/48 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off. You can also set Gsensor for the dash cam, when your vehicle suffers from vibration or collision, it will automatically start recording and lock the key video.

Install Tip: The B+ (yellow) The yellow cable should be connected to the fuse of the constant power supply in the car fuse box. If you are looking for a constant power supply in the fuse box: Use a voltage tester to check the fuse to ensure it still have electricity even if the car engine is off. The ACC (red) Identify the ACC (Accessory) fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power when the ignition is on. Testing method : The tester bulb will light when the engine if on and won't light when the engine is off. The Ground (black) This black cable is connected to the metal parts of the vehicle. There are screw nails and metal parts near the fuse boxes in many cars. Connect the black cable to the screw or metal part.

F7N-PLUS F7N-S F7N F7N Touch Type C port-Hardwire Kit Video Resolution 3840*2160P/2560*1440P+1080P 3840*2160P/2560*1440P 3840*2160P/2560*1440P+1080P 3840*2160P/2560*1440P+1080P N/A Camera Type Front+Rear Front Front+Rear Front+Rear N/A Wi-Fi ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ N/A GPS ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ N/A SD card included ✓ ✘ ✘ ✓ N/A Storage/Battery Type 256G Max, Super capacitor 256G Max, Super capacitor 256G Max, Super capacitor 256G Max, Super capacitor N/A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard wire kit for RedTiger dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Easily installed kit for hard wiring dash cam. A bit too long for my vehicle, but no problem to tuck away in the dash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: The original cord for the rear camera was too short to route to the bumper of my truck. Customer service sent me a longer cord to make the rear camera useable for my truck. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to wire my car with front and rear cameras. Eventually I'm going to use the other one to wire both sides of my car. I am homeless and the cameras make me feel more secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the Truck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than cigarette lighter
reviews.reviewText: Al the time had kick that out from cigarette lighter on my toyota,so it is fixing issue and not to hard install but take some time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Quality product, simple setup. The camera didn't immediately recognize that it was hardwired, but a few power cycles fixed it, no issue. Works well, glad to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs some updates, nice and long though
reviews.reviewText: Would like to see the Acc fuse end come with a fuse tap or two, that would be helpful. There is no in-line fuse in the battery line, which there should be to protect the device, had to wire my own in. That said, I really like the fact it’s really long, precut amount of working wire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera hardwire kit has a good length and feels sturdy. But, the USB-C end connector is a letdown. It's loose and wiggles a lot when plugged in, coming off way too easily – like it's barely attached. Ended up returning it.
This seller was excellent with customer service, the product is also excellent. Great quality fast shipping
